abstract: Adrien Theaux wins World Cup downhill in Santa Caterina Valfurva, Italy; other skiing news noted.
lead_paragraph: Adrien Théaux won a World Cup downhill in Santa Caterina Valfurva, Italy, by 1.04 seconds, but Christof Innerhofer of Italy grabbed most of the attention by finishing fourth after skiing halfway down the course with a gate attached to him.

headline.main: Skier Drags Gate to the Line
headline.print_headline: Skier Drags Gate to the Line

snippet: Adrien Théaux won a World Cup downhill in Santa Caterina Valfurva, Italy, by 1.04 seconds, but Christof Innerhofer of Italy grabbed most of the attention by finishing fourth after skiing halfway down the course with a gate attached to him.
